name: Geometry Jump - Don't miss the white blocks & avoid the spikes
name_original: Geometry Jump - Don't miss the white blocks & avoid the spikes
description:
How far can you jump?
Jump the ball as far as you can to beat your friends score! Be careful of those blocks and spikes, and don't let it close on you. They are Dangerous!

Don't be deceived by its simple look.. It's difficult and addictive!! Once you start, you can't stop!
